name: torch
desc: Wooden stick lit on fire used to illuminate an area.

name: sword
desc: Sharp Weapon that can be used to slash at things.

name: spear
desc: Long stick with a sharp metal point that can be used to jab things.

name: necklace
desc: A necklace in the shape of a jeweled scarab.

name: brooch
desc: A brooch in the shape of a jeweled scarab.

name: key
desc: A key used to open a locked door leading to the Chamber of Passing.

name: earplugs
desc: Small object used to plug ears.

name: journal
desc: A book that can be read to learn more information about the tomb.

name: tusk
desc: A broken off piece of an elephant's tusk.

name: cat
desc: A small sculpture of a cat that can be carried.

name: scarab
desc: A small sculpture of a scarab that can be carried.
